data.title: Dark Eyes 4
data.meta_description: Dark Eyes 4 was a full cast audio anthology released on 2 March 2015 by Big Finish Productions. It was the fourth and final release of the Dark Eyes audio series. It featured Paul McGann as the Eighth Doctor and Nicola Walker as Liv Chenka. 4.1 A Life in the Day by John Dorney The Doctor and Liv...
data.text:
Dark Eyes 4 was a full cast audio anthology released on 2 March 2015 by Big Finish Productions. It was the fourth and final release of the Dark Eyes audio series. It featured Paul McGann as the Eighth Doctor and Nicola Walker as Liv Chenka.

Publisher's summary[]

4.1 A Life in the Day by John Dorney

The Doctor and Liv return to post-World War One London, where the Doctor meets Kitty Donaldson (Beth Chalmers), and Liv strikes a friendship with her brother Martin (Barnaby Kay). But what mysterious force is hunting them?

4.2 The Monster of Montmartre by Matt Fitton

The Doctor and Liv's investigations bring them to Paris, where a monster stalks the streets.

4.3 Master of the Daleks by John Dorney

The Master and the Dalek Time Controller have forged an alliance. History hangs in the balance, and this time the Doctor can't help...

4.4 Eye of Darkness by Matt Fitton

It's the endgame. Truths will be revealed, and a hero will make the ultimate sacrifice.

Cast[]

The Doctor - Paul McGann

Liv Chenka - Nicola Walker

The Reborn Master - Alex Macqueen

Featured[]

Kitty Donaldson - Beth Chalmers

Martin Donaldson - Barnaby Kay

Adelaine Dutemps - Rachael Stirling

Georges Legrand - Blake Ritson

Christian Favreau - Alex Wyndham

The Daleks - Nicholas Briggs

The Sontarans - Dan Starkey

Mary - Sorcha Cusack

Anya - Susannah Harker

The Eminence - David Sibley

Stories[]

# Title Author Director Doctor Featuring Released Pr. code 4.1 A Life in the Day John Dorney Ken Bentley 8th Liv, Kitty Donaldson 2 March 2015 BFPDWCDMG038 4.2 The Monster of Montmartre Matt Fitton Liv, Daleks, Dalek Time Controller, Dalek Time Strategist, the Reborn Master 4.3 Master of the Daleks John Dorney Liv, Molly, the Master, Daleks, Dalek Time Controller, Dalek Time Strategist, Sontarans 4.4 Eye of Darkness Matt Fitton Liv, Molly, Daleks, Dalek Time Controller, Dalek Supreme, the Eminence

Notes[]

This is the only Dark Eyes to feature Daleks, Sontarans, the Reborn Master and the Eminence.

This is the only Dark Eyes boxset in which Liv Chenka appears in all the stories.

This is the only Dark Eyes boxset not to feature Sally Armstrong.

This box set was recorded on 29 & 31 October, 1, 17-18 & 21 November 2014 at The Moat Studios.
